analysis.description:
Crowdsale.saleTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xedc8c33d811ed9628472a6555e41782f3d8b389f.sol#214-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_newInvestor,_value) (/unique_chucks/10/0xedc8c33d811ed9628472a6555e41782f3d8b389f.sol#226)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xedc8c33d811ed9628472a6555e41782f3d8b389f.sol#228-257) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/10/0xedc8c33d811ed9628472a6555e41782f3d8b389f.sol#257)
